      • pause

        public void pause()

      • reboot

        public void reboot()
         reboot device
 Must use "android:sharedUserId="android.uid.system"" into manifest
 Must use system sign
 for example:
  manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
      xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
      android:sharedUserId="android.uid.system"

        public void resume()
        observer eye protection changed

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
         shutdown device
 Must use "android:sharedUserId="android.uid.system"" into manifest
 Must use system sign
 for example:
  manifest xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
      xmlns:tools="http://schemas.android.com/tools"
      android:sharedUserId="android.uid.system"
